scripts.start: npm run clean && watchy -w src -- npm run build-dev & livereload build/bundle.js & http-server
scripts.build-dev: npm run compileglsl && npm run concat && cp build/build.js build/bundle.js
scripts.build-jscrush: export NODE_ENV=production; npm run clean && npm run compileglsl && npm run concat && npm run jscrush
scripts.jscrush: cat build/build.js | uglifyjs -cm | tee build/build.min.js | jscrush > build/bundle.js && wc -c build/*.js
scripts.regpack: cat build/build.js | uglifyjs -cm | tee build/build.min.js && ./scripts/regpack.sh build/build.min.js > build/bundle.js && wc -c build/*.js
